Articles.Content: Would be cool if you could still do experiments and gather data in sandbox mode, even if it doesn't really do anything.
+1. Although you can start a career mode game, hack 10000000 science, and get experiments, it doesn't work for mods without tech tree implementation, and takes a while.

oh please no, please no, not another flame fest

leave the thread before it begins..... just leave it.....

Going a bit overboard there Nemrav....

Plus, maybe this needs to be on the "what not to suggest" list, science is for career mode not sandbox
It would be nice to find out how much science an experiment would be worth, if you were running in career mode.

It would be nice to find out how much science an experiment would be worth, if you were running in career mode.

I think it'd be nice more because you could look through the archives and go "I didn't just go to these places, I went to these places and did stuff!" Especially if the science report screens get a more interesting text report with more detail; for instance, if you want to play sandbox, but you also really want to know what Minmus is made out of without having to play career mode and grind the parts you need.
